definition: dysentery characterized by white mucous stool/white diarrhea

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Pathorphological observation of naturally occurring and experimental pullorum disease of chicks was conducted.
sentences.chinese: 对自发性和实验性雏鸡白痢病进行了病理形态学观察。

sentences.english: Besides, the ecological therapy of chicken pullorosis was also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 另外，还对鸡白痢的生态疗法进行了讨论。

sentences.english: Controlling piglets Huang pullorum disease is the key to improve the survival rate of piglets.
sentences.chinese: 控制好仔猪黄白痢病，是提高仔猪成活率的关键。

definition: porcine reproductive and respiratory syndrome (PRRS)/blue-ear swine fever

definition: ascariasis/infectation by parasitic roundworm Ascaris lumbricoides
epidemic encephalitis B, aka Japanese encephalitis
